A '''sandstone slab''' is a [[sandstone]] variant of a [[slab]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Sandstone slabs can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{breaking row
|Sandstone Slab
|Pickaxe
|Wooden
|item=1
|link=none
|horizontal=1
}}

=== Natural generation ===
Sandstone slabs generate as part of [[desert pyramid]]s, [[desert]] [[village]]s, and [[desert well]]s.

=== Note blocks ===
Sandstone slabs can be placed under [[note block]]s to produce "bass drum" sounds.
